attributes.action: INVESTIGATE BEBO'S CLOSER OF BRITISH ARMY  REMEMBERENCE PAGES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. WHY HAS BEBO CLOSED DOWN SO MANY LOYALIST BRITISH PEOPLES PAGES. 
2. ARMY PAGES SET UP TO REMEMBER OUR FALLEN TROOPS.
3. USA PAGES FOR FALLEN TROOPS
4. WHEN YOU COMMPLAN ABOUT PEOPLE LEAVING HATE COMMENTS ON THESE PAGES THEY TELL YOU THEY DONT WARRENT INVESTIGTION THEN THE PERSON THAT COMMPLEANS GET BLOCKED THEMSELFS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
